attributes.additional_details:
This page has been created by a group of individuals who have became increasingly concerned by the financial situation at Glasgow Rangers Football Club.  The purpose of the group is to create pressure to remove David Murray's Knighthood as recent developments have exposed his business dealings and misleadings which have potentially defrauded the British Taxpayer to the tune of £50m+

EBT's explained:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-glasgow-west-18169502

Allegations against Murray and EBT scheme he piloted:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-glasgow-west-18169501
